Summary: had two lights and hung in the sky. very large
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Schenectady

divs: Sighting DetailsWent on my deck to smoke and saw two lights close together. At first it looked like two stars but noticed a shape between them . a oval shape it hovered stationary and then backed into the clouds.
